verbs.description: A May poll from [ARG1: the Florida Atlantic University Business and Economics Polling Initiative] , [V: scheduled] [ARG2: for release] [ARG3: Wednesday] , found 43 percent of Florida voters approve and 45 percent disapprove of President Donald Trump ’s performance .
